titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Finding aid prepared by Brian Carpenter

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:13-0400

did.unittitle: Karok language recordings
did.abstract: Elicited Karok words and phrases, with occasional anecdotes and conversation about Karok social life and customs.
did.physdesc: 12 sound cassettes (8 hr., 52 min.) : analog, 1 7/8 ips, stereo.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Presented by Monica Macaulay in 1994 (Acc. 1994-131r). This material was recorded with the assistance of a Phillips Fund grant.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Transcripts and notes from the recording session are available in the Phillips Fund Collection (Mss.497.3.Am4).

did.unittitle: Audio recordings
Elicitation of miscellaneous words

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicited Karok words, with occasional anecdotes and conversation about Karok social life and customs.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Elicitation of miscellaneous words and phrases, with description of preparing acorns

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicited Karok words and phrases, with occasional anecdotes and conversation about Karok social life and customs. Includes lengthy description in Karok and English of preparing and cooking acorns.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Elicitation of miscellaneous words and grammar

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicited Karok words and grammar, with occasional anecdotes and conversation about Karok social life and customs. Includes some words for plants and animals. Grammar includes "best ___" and "nothing but ____" constructions and superlative adjectives.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Elicitation of miscellaneous adjective forms

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicited Karok adjectives, with occasional anecdotes and conversation about Karok social life and customs. Includes superlative adjectives, locatives, adjectival noun suffixes, and "-less" and "without" forms.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.

did.unittitle: Story of why the eel has no bones, and elicitation of miscellaneous words

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Story of how eel lost his bones, followed by elicited Karok words, with occasional anecdotes and conversation about Karok social life and customs.

did.unittitle: Elicitation of miscellaneous words, "Bigfoot Story," and story of a female doctor

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Elicited Karok words, with occasional anecdotes and conversation about Karok social life and customs, plus a story about local Bigfoot sightings and a story about a female Karok doctor who healed an eye ailment.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: This file is a compressed, digitized version of the original. The APS Library maintains the original format (Audiocassette) as well as an uncompressed digitized version of this recording.
